item.title: CVE-2024-8885|2024-10-02T13:12:52.938Z -- sophos -- sophos%20intercept%20x
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Sophos Intercept X for Windows with Central Device Encryption 2024.2.0 and older allows writing of arbitrary files.
